item.title: Pocketbase Chat App
item.description: In the following tutorial we will build a chat app with Pocketbase and Svelte. Pocketbase is a backend (inspired by Firebase) structured as a single executable file. It provides a realtime DB based on SQLite and user authentication system that allows us to quickly prototype and deploy a chat app. Pocketbase Setup Serve it Locally First, download pocketbase then run the executable locally with ./pocketbase serve.
